i1.name: Lightslinger
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After casting an [[champion ability|ability]], '''Lucian's''' next [[basic attack]] {{tip|on-attack}} within {{fd|3.5}} seconds fires an additional shot after {{fd|0.25}} seconds, which deals {{as|{{pp|key=%|50 to 60|1;7;13}} AD {{as|physical damage}}}}, increased to {{as|100% AD}} against {{tip|minion|minions}}.
The second shot applies {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects at 100% effectiveness and is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
If '''Lucian's''' primary target is killed before the second shot can go off, he automatically shoots another enemy in range.

''Lightslinger will not be consumed and will not trigger the second basic attack if '''Lucian''' is
{{tip|silence|silenced}}, unless the {{tip|attack windup|attack's windup}} had already started.''
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: After casting an champion ability, Lucian's next basic attack on-attack within 3.5 seconds fires an additional shot after 0.25 seconds, which deals 1;7;13 â€’ undefined AD physical damage, increased to 100% AD against minions.
The second shot applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness and is affected by critical strike modifiers.
If Lucian's primary target is killed before the second shot can go off, he automatically shoots another enemy in range.
Lightslinger will not be consumed and will not trigger the second basic attack if Lucian is
silenced, unless the attack's windup had already started.
i1.notes:
* ''Lightslinger'' is triggered and consumed by the first attack.
* The second attack, if the initial target was killed, will prioritize enemy champions regardless of having {{tip|sight}} of them or not and enemy {{tip|minion|minions}} with {{sti|health|{{as|low health}}}}.
** ''Lightslinger'' will still be consumed if no second target is found when '''Lucian''' fires.
* '''Lucian''' can perform actions freely while firing ''Lightslinger'' since the second attack is integrated into the first one
** The second attack has special movement animations depending on the direction '''Lucian''' is moving while firing.
* The additional shot counts as a separate hit for effects such as {{ri|Electrocute}}, {{iis|Muramana}} {{nie|Shock}}, and {{iis|Eclipse}} {{nie|Ever Rising Moon}}.

q1.name: Piercing Light
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lucian''' fires a laser in a line in the direction of the target enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies within.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Lucian fires a laser in a line in the direction of the target enemy, dealing physical damage to all enemies within.
q1.notes: * ''Piercing Light'' will attempt to lead the target if it is moving but does not adjust further during cast time (enemies can dodge the laser if they change their position by a sufficient amount during the cast time).

e1.name: Relentless Pursuit
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} ''Relentless Pursuit's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by 1 second for each {{ai|Lightslinger|Lucian}} shot landed, doubled to 2 seconds against enemy champions.
''Relentless Pursuit'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Lucian's''' basic attack timer.
''Relentless Pursuit'' can be cast during {{ai|The Culling|Lucian}} and other abilities can be cast during ''Relentless Pursuit''.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Relentless Pursuit's cooldown is reduced by 1 second for each Lightslinger shot landed, doubled to 2 seconds against enemy champions.
Active: Lucian dashes in the target direction.
Relentless Pursuit resets Lucian's basic attack timer.
Relentless Pursuit can be cast during The Culling and other abilities can be cast during Relentless Pursuit.
e1.notes:
* Additional on-hits during ''Lightslinger'' are not considered for the cooldown reduction (i.e {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}, {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}).
* Unlike some dashes, '''Lucian's''' dash speed does ''not'' scale with his {{as|movement speed}}.

r1.name: The Culling
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lucian''' {{tip|channel|channels}} for up to 3 seconds, rapidly firing shots in the target direction. Each shot deals {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy hit, doubled against enemy {{tip|minion|minions}}. ''The Culling'' can be recast after {{fd|0.75}} seconds during the channel, and does so automatically when the channel ends.
While channeling, '''Lucian''' always faces in the casted direction and is {{tip|ghosted}}, and he fires the shots in the target direction from his current position.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lucian channels for up to 3 seconds, rapidly firing shots in the target direction. Each shot deals physical damage to the first enemy hit, doubled against enemy minions. The Culling can be recast after 0.75 seconds during the channel, and does so automatically when the channel ends.
While channeling, Lucian always faces in the casted direction and is ghosted, and he fires the shots in the target direction from his current position.
Recast: Lucian ends The Culling.
r1.notes:
* '''Lucian''' can interact with {{ai|Dark Passage|Thresh}} or {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench}} without {{tip|interrupt|interrupting}} ''The Culling''.
* ''The Culling'' creates the shots at an offset of 35 units to the front plus 35 units towards each side of '''Lucian''' (sides alternating, first shot fired from '''Lucian's''' right gun), unlike the missiles of most abilities.
* The damage dealt by each bullet of ''The Culling'' is calculated when the bullet reaches a target, just like single missile abilities.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} only blocks one instance of damage.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Lucian''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|cast={{ai|Relentless Pursuit|Lucian}} is usable. {{ai|Piercing Light|Lucian}} and {{ai|Ardent Blaze|Lucian}} are disabled. This ability recasts to end channel.|move=true|items=true,true,interrupts,true,true|attack=false|spells=true,true,true,false,false}}
